member.name: T:Enemies.Zombie
member.summary: Defines a zombie with name, health, and string representation.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new Zombie with 0 health.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new Zombie with the specified health.

member.name: P:Enemies.Zombie.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the zombie's name.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.ToString
member.summary: Returns a formatted string describing the zombie.
